sentences.english: Please forgive me for opening your letter by mistake.

sentences.english: The demolishment of the Star Ferry Pier in 2006 intensified such movements.
sentences.chinese: 2006年，天星码头的迁拆更强化了这类行动。

sentences.english: And dismantle the stand or fall of a contact and the perhaps sex is great.
sentences.chinese: 而拆搭的好坏与和出的或许性联络甚大。

sentences.english: This is akin to breaking up a complex application or component into multiple modules.
sentences.chinese: 这类似于将一个复杂应用程序或组件拆分为多个模块。

sentences.english: So they bought a home and tore it down to build a custom home.
sentences.chinese: 所以他们拆了买的那套房子后，建了一套定制住宅。

sentences.english: The bottom loop can be excreted from tail water corridor.
sentences.chinese: 底环与座环用螺栓连接，底环从尾水廊道处装拆。

sentences.english: The ruling divided Standard Oil into thirty-four independent companies.
sentences.chinese: 并裁定将标准石油公司拆分为34个独立的公司。

sentences.english: Excuse me for opening your letter by mistake.
sentences.chinese: 请原谅我不小心拆了你的信。

sentences.english: He changed into a new suit.
Their job is to break up the old ship.
The factory we built, I was told, was demolished, I felt very sad.
sentences.chinese: 听说我们当年建的工厂被拆了，很伤心。

sentences.english: The accident took place on a site where a 25-storey building was to be demolished.
sentences.chinese: 意外现场为一幢清拆中的楼宇，楼高25层。

sentences.english: The machine has been knocked down ready for shipment.
"I'm afraid the street will be knocked down sooner or later, " Ji said.
sentences.chinese: “我担心这个街区早晚要被拆，”嵇汝广说。

sentences.english: I didn't open your letter, the envelope came unstuck.
sentences.chinese: 我没有拆你的信，信封本来就没粘牢。
